Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lelion Way, south of the Enchanted Forest.
Room.LongDescription: The forest trees are old and stately, forming a canopy of branches overhead. Lelion Way continues to the east and west through the woods. To the east is a wooden bridge spanning the Ashton River. Further to the southeast is the famed Ashton waterfalls and the Ashton Falls Resort. On the south side is an apple orchid.
